purpose: A thread pool implementation using blocking queues for concurrent task processing with message passing capabilities

public_functions.name: new
public_functions.signature: pub fn new<F>(nt:u8, f:F) -> ThreadPool<M> where F: FnOnce(&BlockingQueue<M>) -> () + Send + 'static + Copy

parameters.name: nt
parameters.description: number of threads to create in the pool

parameters.name: f
parameters.description: function that defines the thread processing logic

public_functions.description: Constructs a new threadpool with specified number of threads and processing function

public_functions.name: wait
public_functions.description: Waits for all threads in the pool to finish execution

public_functions.name: post_message
public_functions.signature: pub fn post_message(&mut self, _msg:M) where M:Debug + Clone

parameters.name: _msg
parameters.description: message to post to the threadpool queue

public_functions.description: Posts a message to the ThreadPool's blocking queue for processing

public_functions.name: get_message
public_functions.signature: pub fn get_message(&mut self) -> M where M:Debug + Clone + Default
public_functions.description: Returns results from the threadpool (currently returns default value - incomplete implementation)

public_classes.name: ThreadPool<M>
public_classes.description: A generic threadpool structure that manages multiple worker threads with a shared blocking queue
